title: [1.6.4][ssp/smp][汉化]乌龟MOD[影狼MOD汉化组]
author: 压力马斯内
txt_content:
乌龟mod

1.6.4
安装需要forge 1.6.4

---------------------------------------------------------------------我是分割线--------------------------------------------------------------------


这个mod添加了乌龟在MC中

普通乌龟


恶魔乌龟


末影乌龟



普通乌龟护甲


恶魔乌龟护甲


末影乌龟护甲


合成：
任何龟壳都可以替换











-用苹果可以繁殖乌龟
-掉落龟壳
-驯服普通乌龟需要金苹果
-驯服特殊乌龟需要胡萝卜

---------------------------------------------------------------------我是分割线--------------------------------------------------------------------

下载：

乌龟MOD1.3


更新记录：（未翻译）

-v1.3
-updated for minecraft 1.6.4
-changed breeding food from wheat to apples
-added ability to tame turtles with golden apples
-added ability to heal tamed turtles by feeding them carrots
-added turtle "sit" animation
-added ender shell armor
-added demon shell armor
-added ender turtle mob
-updated turtle demon texture
-bug fixes

-v1.2 
-updated for minecraft 1.6.2
-implemented SMP support
-added turtle demon mob
-bug fixes

-v1.1 
-updated for minecraft 1.4.2
-updated turtle textures

-v1.0 
-initial release






已知bugs：


小乌龟会隐藏在方块里，但是跳跃的时候你可以看到他们

replies.author: JUNS
replies.txt_content: - -！~这龟壳一股浓浓的马里奥感觉

replies.author: 小黑好萌.
replies.txt_content: 78的帖子当然要出来顶~  话说好可爱的乌龟啊0.0

replies.author: 战神丶奎爷
replies.txt_content: 我居然想起龟仙人和忍者神龟  我这是动漫看过头了吗  还有救么{:10_524:}
